episodesJson.title: Love of humanity, part one
episodesJson.description: This program features the first part of lectures from Beatrice Fairchild, biophysicist, Columbia University; and Johnson E. Fairchild, geographer, social philosopher, Director of Adult Education, The Cooper Union.

creator.name: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art

series.title: Peace, love, creativity: Hope of mankind
